name: The Kindling
description:
You are a young Toluna, just turned 17 and finally allowed to go on your big expedition. You've found yourself in the Swamps of Drogan, home to the Rykan. They are a peaceful community made up of many small villages. It just so happens that your expedition lines up with the Rykan's annual Festival of Light. Help them light all the lanterns around the swamp to see the end of the night's festivities!

CONTROLS

Use W/S (Up/Down) to increase and decrease your boat speed. 

Use A/D (Left/Right) to turn the boat. The same controls for for the arrow keys.

Press SHIFT to look up into the incredible skies of Drogan.

Press SPACE to use your boat's horn. 

Press ESC to open the Pause Menu. 

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

WINDOWS REQUIREMENTS: Recommended

  • OS: Windows 8.1 64 bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 670 2GB / AMD R9 280 better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

MAC REQUIRMENTS: Recommended

  • OS: macOS Mojave 10.14 or later
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000 1536 MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Made by Arjun Jaishankar, Kat LoScalzo, Adam Goren, Mickey Torres, and Elisabeth Yuhas.
